routes.name: media_list

schema.returns: List of images in media directory

routes.usage_note: Used internally by CMS and file pickers.

routes.name: media_upload
routes.description: Upload images with automatic compression & conversion

routes.name: blog_list

items.slug: string - The unique identifier for the blog post.
items.title: string - The title of the blog post.
items.content: string - A summary of the blog post's content.
items.tags: List[string] - A list of tags associated with the post.
items.thumb: string - URL or path to the post's thumbnail image.
items.type: string - The type of the page (e.g., 'blog').
items.created: string - The creation date of the post (ISO format).
items.updated: string - The last updated date of the post (ISO format).
items.author: string - The name of the post's author.

routes.description: List all available blog posts with summary data.

routes.name: blog_get

returns.slug: string - The unique identifier for the blog post.
returns.title: string - The title of the blog post.
returns.content: string - The meta description of the blog post.
returns.markdown: string - The full content of the post in Markdown format.
returns.html: string - The full content of the post rendered as HTML.
returns.tags: List[string] - A list of tags associated with the post.
returns.thumb: string - URL or path to the post's thumbnail image.
returns.type: string - The type of the page (e.g., 'blog').
returns.created: string - The creation date of the post (ISO format).
returns.updated: string - The last updated date of the post (ISO format).
returns.author: string - The name of the post's author.

routes.description: Retrieve a single blog page by its slug, including full content.
